categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic locations

nodes.text: Dac City was a city on the planet Mon Cala, which was also known as Dac. Sometime after the Proclamation of the New Order, King Lee-Char met with Imperial ambassador Telvar to discuss trade proposals between the Empire and Mon Cala here. After the death of Ambassador Telvar, Imperial forces landed in the city, culminating in the Battle of Dac City.
Dac City first appeared in Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 13, a 2017 canon comic written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli.
